hadiths.text: It has been narrated on the authority of Jarir b. Abdullah who said:I saw that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) was twisting the forelock of a horse with his fingers and he was saying: (A great) benefit. i. e. reward (for rearing them for Jihad) and spoils of war, has been tied to the forelocks of horses until the Day of Judgment

chapter.ara-name: باب الْخَيْلُ فِي نَوَاصِيهَا الْخَيْرُ إِلَى يَوْمِ الْقِيَامَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The virtue of horses; "Goodness is tied to their Forelocks."
